Reviews.Title: New 2012 Cell phone watch
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: So, I have had this watch since the 7th and I am having moisture issues wich causes the screen to become unresponsive to touch...and I have to pull the back off and dry it out.  I am not sure if it's from just sweat on my wrist of from washing my hands.  I like the watch and I hope I can get it to dry out enough to stay working properly.  The watch functions well and you can use the built in speaker as long as it's not too noisy around you.  The Camera takes ok pictures and the Video camera is not that great (choppy video).  The Radio works well and so does the music player...even the supplied headset isn't too bad.  The phone has some cool features, it has a feature to turn on and off the watch at times that you set, an alarm function with 5 alarms.  I love the watch and I hope that my issue will clear up.Update: 9/3/12The phone stopped responding to inputs on the screen a couple of weeks ago... my fault due to getting it wet while washing my hands.  So, Be carefull when washing hands or around water.  I did buy another watch and I have kept it away the H20 and has worked flawlessly so far, except for my charging port on my watch... it has for some reason stopped working and now I can't charge my batteries.  I luckily kept my old watch and now use that to charge my batteries.  So, am I just having bad luck????? I guess there are a bazillion scenarios for what could have happened... guess it's just one of those things with electronics.  I still like the watch and I would recommend it.Hope some of my Pain will help in the decision making process.

Reviews.Title: Charger dead, too many defects
Reviews.Author: SP
Reviews.Content: I liked the watch, but then the charger died 1 day after I got it. Now it's dead. I can't see if it's just the cord or the watch itself that broke since it's this weird Chinese-made connector. Now I have to return it, which annoys me greatly. This thing gets a 1.Here's some other stuff that went wrong with it that I was willing to live with:#1: The stylus broke in 1 day. The top part fell out, then while trying to fix it, it got pushed in so I can't extend it anymore.EDIT: I was able to recover the stylus with a thumb tack! YAY!#2: Touchscreen has a bug where it won't recognize touch for more than about a second. Tapping works fine, but it's very difficult to move icons, and the handwriting feature doesn't work at all. Try to write an O, and I can only get half done before it cuts out.#3: This watch did not come with the bluetooth headset or 2GB flash card as advertised. However, when I spoke to Amazon about it, they helped me out. That's not really a strike against the watch; just wanted to mention it. I'd say it's actually a plus as far as Amazon's customer service is concerned.FYI, if you're going to use it to listen to music via bluetooth audio, remember to set it to stereo output. Scared myself for a bit there thinking the sound quality was going to be like AM-radio!

Reviews.Title: Very good phone. I recommended it to my best friends.
Reviews.Author: Abdullah
Reviews.Content: The watch is just perfect for my needs. Making calls is very easy and the voice is clear. It is very light, and no issues withe battery.I had many other watch phones, but this is the best among them.

Reviews.Title: I would love it if it sync by bluetooth with an iPhone 4s
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: unfortunately this item can not connect via bluetooth with the iPhone 4s. I was under the impression the watch phone would work via bluetooth. I was told at At&T; that the watch would work if I used a sim card and stopped using my iPhone :-(. The watch functionality is cool but not enough to leave my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: it is terrible
Reviews.Author: Charla Viera
Reviews.Content: i was so wanting to buy this when i got it i thought omg it is here it works bad because the touch screen part does not work to the touch of your finger at all but if you buy this you maybe disappointed

Reviews.Title: Liked it.
Reviews.Author: Roselyn Fair "ros5434"
Reviews.Content: No radio function as pictured, but really like this watch/phone. Good speaker volume, fairly responsive touch screen and real conversation starter.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Skipper
Reviews.Content: its okay the touch screen is a bit difficult to use but it does do what it says but if sending a text message forget it the keypad is to damn small!

Reviews.Title: needs to include sim card
Reviews.Author: Carolynn
Reviews.Content: i like it but the only problem is is that it dont tell you what kind of sim card it needs so i end up buying tje wrong one. now i need to find one that fits

Reviews.Title: will not sync with a cell phone.
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: i bought this to use with my samsung galaxy S 111.the bluetooth will transfer files.you can call 911.but i wanted to be able to receive calls on it from my samsung.this way if i do not want to have to take the phone out of its case,i can just hang up.it will not do this.it can only be used as a phone with a full size sim installed.wifi will not work without the sim.watch function will only show analog,not digital.watch runs slow if battery is weaker.battery usage stinks.if you get one days usage,consider yourself lucky.it will accept a 8tb chip and use it.as i said ,it can only be used as a phone.the little speaker is pretty loud for its size.audio is very clear.if i had known that i cannot fully sync it to my phone,i would never have bought it.it will make a good gift to some one who is a butter fingers and drops and breaks her phones.just lock it to her wrist with super glue.i will have to do that.

Reviews.Title: awesome device
Reviews.Author: ju
Reviews.Content: I just bought this item and I think it works perfectly my family loves it don't be mad if you buy this item because it is under $100 and all of my friends think it is amazing they are shocked that it is so cheap.

Reviews.Title: Perfect device
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: This watch is excellent I bought it for my grandson and he loved it says it's the best thing ever the charger and buttons work this is a great device

Reviews.Title: Seller did their job but...
Reviews.Author: Saulo
Reviews.Content: In all honesty this product is very faulty and not worth the hassle. Please spend more in a product that actually works like it should that is made in USA,

Reviews.Title: Needs Help
Reviews.Author: RH
Reviews.Content: 1 Battery Charger was not in box upon delivery2 As per other comments, stylus is flimsy3 Phone Watch battery does not hold its charge very long4 Needs better instructions for use5 Internet use seems to be random due not "insufficient memory" (not sure what that means when I have a 4gig memory card so still wanting to correct this problem)6 Still waiting to hear back from seller as to where I can get a replacement battery from manufacturer.7 Internet use uses more battery life than talking and talking uses more battery life than texting.A good little tool that could be great.

Reviews.Title: The accessary is too simple to follow and a little inconvenient to use
Reviews.Author: Nain-Feng Chu
Reviews.Content: It looks ok, but the instruction is poorly follow.The accessary is too simple to follow and a little inconvenient to use.

Reviews.Title: Cool gadget
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: This thing is a cool gadget.  I do not plan on keeping it as a watch.  If fact I am in the process of modifying its form factor for other things.  It's a "IPod" GUI design knockoff; none the less its still amazingly compact (size of IPod Nano just three times as thick).  The phone operates on the GSM network; thus, you need to purchase a SIM card and have GSM compatible communications towers in your area of usage.  Anywhere OCONUS will work fine!

Reviews.Title: When you get a signal...Great
Reviews.Author: David W Shaban
Reviews.Content: Our cell/smart phones show 4 bars, the watch shows 2 or 3. Find a good spot and enjoy the watch phone.

Reviews.Title: not good its not worth your money
Reviews.Author: Mario sanchez
Reviews.Content: im disapointed waist of money baterry runs out fast to small i dont recomend this to anyone thankyou for reading.

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen watch cell phone
Reviews.Author: Oumar
Reviews.Content: The batteries don't last long at all.the came with the second batteries but both of them are out of service right now and i don't where to order new one and without batteries i don't know what to do with the watch.PLease  any advise where to order just batteries...Thanks

Reviews.Content: from wat i read it seems like a good watch but perfect if youll can make it waterproof n everybody would get one think about it
